properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEMBER_NO ID PWD NAME MEMBER_NICKNAME GENDER DATE_OF_BIRTH EMAIL PHONE ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )

SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, GENDER, USER_NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTH, JOIN_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS, USER_HOST, USER_ADMIN FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
